module.name: imageFuser
module.description: Simple image fuser, to recompose an image from an imageSplitter format.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Simply recompose an image coming from an imageSplitter module (or similar port configuration). Display the image in an opencv window. \n

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name
To specify the port namespace to read from (should match the splitter name).
The number of divisions in width.
The number of divisions in height.
The number of divisions of the fovea.
The proportion of the image dimensions to be used as fovea.

input.description: Send the image corresponding to the x_y region in the input image. As many output ports as regions will be created (e.g /imageSplitter/split/2_2:o will read the center region with the default 3x3 division)

Read the image corresponding to the x_y region of the fovea in the input image. As many input ports as regions will be created (e.g /imageFuser/fovea/split/2_2:o will read the center region with a 3x3 division)
